name: Wrath of the Stone (Firefox edition)
description:
Itch.io has a Firefox cross origin policies bug at the moment, so here's a special version for Firefox which doesn't require that to be fixed.

The dwarves are invading our home and we do not like them.

They come for our gems. They dig their tunnels deeper and deeper into our soft heart. We must stop them, oh yes, we must.

Explode them. Burn them in sizzling lava. Poison them with gas. Unleash beasts upon them. Do whatever it takes to stop them in their tracks. They cannot have our gems, oh no, they cannot.

The swarm is endless, so we must kill as many as we can to slow them down. Eventually, we will succumb. But first, we will fight.

Right-click dwarves to see their intentions. Left-click to select and place traps.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48

Tools: 

  • Code: Godot
  • Art: Aseprite, paint.net
  • Audio: Bosca Ceoil, sfxr, Reaper
  • Gifs: ScreenToGif
  • Font: Arcade Classic by Jakob Fischer
